article_title: France Broadens Its MH370 Probe Through Wreckage Analysis
article_text:
PARIS—French authorities are pushing the Malaysian government to share closely held findings from its criminal investigation into the disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370, as part of an examination of suspected wreckage of the jet that France began on Wednesday.

The discovery of the barnacle-covered wing part on Réunion, a French territory in the Indian Ocean, has emboldened France to search for answers that have eluded others in a multinational investigation plagued from the beginning by mistakes,...
